title: Shangri-La is Heavenly
text:
This is a world class hotel that provides you with everything you can think of (bathrobes, soaps, personal items and slippers). Their Scene Caf√© is a great place for breakfast, as they provide both Chinese and American breakfast items. I ordered their Spicy Buffalo Chicken wings and it was a surprise when it arrived, as it had tempura batter and the spicy sauce was on the side! We told them that this is not Spicy Buffalo Chicken wins that are served in Canada.
